nodes.text: A village on the planet Datar was home to many Ghostling inhabitants, including Princess Arawynne. In 32 BBY, the Sakiyan bounty hunter Djas Puhr and his Abyssin sidekick Gondry raided the village and kidnapped several Ghostling children, incuding Arawynne, Alamar, Borofir, Conno, and Coniel. The invaders were working for the Dug Podracer Sebulba, who intended to sell the Ghostlings on the slave market.
